title: Dia’s Word : Implementation; Carrot and Stick
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Aaaaaaaaaa~~~~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Chika-san…. Even at this age you’re still playing with a fan like that, huh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Of course! If there’s a fan, I’ll definitely do it. If I don’t, won’t that be a waste?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>….Well, that’s fine. With that said, you’re not making any progress on your English study though<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Uguu…. I’m getting my motivation out right now. It’s going to come out any minute now<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Chi~ka~sa~~~n?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hyaah!? I-, I’m sorry! I’m motivated now!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s good then. I’m sure this English word among other things will inspire you, Chika-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh~, would it really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Come on, look at the dictionary. It’s on the meaning section<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>There are a lot of meanings though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Please look at the 4th one from the top. Did it inspire you, Chika-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>….Yeah. I’m starting to get an idea. It’s a very wonderful word, Dia-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, I’m looking forward to what kind of lyrics you’ll write, Chika-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
